#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	char a[102], c, temp;
	int te, i, j, p, q, n;
	scanf("%d\n", &te);
	while (te--)
	{
		i = 0;
		gets(a);
		n = strlen(a);
		for (i = 0; i < n;)
		{
			p = i;
			while (a[i] >= 97 && a[i] <= 122)
				i++;
			q = i - 1;
			while (p < q)
			{
				temp = a[p];
				a[p] = a[q];
				a[q] = temp;
				p++;
				q--;
			}
			i++;
		}
		for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
			printf("%c", a[i]);
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
